text: Madame X (Spanish: La mujer X) is a 1955 Mexican drama film directed by Julián Soler and starring Libertad Lamarque.Sadlier p.17 ==Cast== In alphabetical order * Víctor Alcocer * Emilio Brillas * Silvia Derbez * Manuel Dondé * José Ángel Espinosa 'Ferrusquilla' * Paquito Fernández * Miguel Ángel Ferriz * Víctor Junco * Libertad Lamarque * Rodolfo Landa * José María Linares-Rivas * Miguel Ángel López * Julio Monterde * José Elías Moreno * Juan Orraca * Alejandro Parodi * José Pulido * Carlos Robles Gil * Beatriz Saavedra * Hortensia Santoveña * Andrés Soler * Aurora Walker == References == == Bibliography == * Darlene J. Sadlier. Latin American Melodrama: Passion, Pathos, and Entertainment. University of Illinois Press, 2009. == External links == * Category:1955 films Category:1955 drama films Category:Mexican drama films Category:Mexican films Category:Spanish-language films Category:Films directed by Julián Soler Category:Mexican films based on plays
title: Madame X (1955 film)
